author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This PR brings the L1T packer/unpacker tool in line with (not yet available) AMC13 firmware. It is necessary for data taking with the Stage 1 trigger.  Because of a backwards incompatibility between the actual firmware and the offline anticipation of the firmware, additional customization will be needed to unpack L1 payload from RAW data produced via MC under 74X, if such capability is needed.

This PR (will) include the customization for HLT promised in PR #9981.
title: L1t stage1 unpacker hlt 76x
